item.title: Nissan Silvia (1965)
item.description:
Publication: Car Graphic
Format: Road Test
Date: December 1971
Author: TBD

Introducing the Silvia

Nissan’s new Silvia is a two-seater coupe with a beautifully-proportioned body, and both the design and the finish are excellent. Leather edging, reminiscent of high-end British coachwork, is seen everywhere in the interior, psychologically expanding the interior space and making the work of driving easier, making it a distinctive feature of this car. However, compared to custom bodies from Italy, it is still over-decorated.
